subject: Football
Deaths (Fatalities)
News and News Media
Education (K-12)
Traffic Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: A Mainland Regional High School teacher and his journalism students address a difficult subject in class — the deaths of four of the school’s football players in a crash.
